document_data.caption: A map showing the North Jotunhammer Mountains in Norland.
document_data.name: North Jotunhammer Mountains
document_data.mainbody: The '''North Jotunhammer Mountains''' were a prominent mountain range located on the island of [[Norland]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The mountains dominated much of central and northern Norland. They stretched from central Norland near the [[North Cape]] up the island's western coast to end at the north end of the island, covering a distance of over {{SI|100|mi|k|long=yes}}. The mountains formed the entire western edge of the [[Frostfenn]]. They were separated from the [[South Jotunhammer Mountains]] by several miles of open terrain.
